content:
First investment received! 🦍
Inv1_14-02: $602.00 from @JGIOERICH
Tx: 2TBcvGRcw7xCJctgHpcuFmaS4wsmAVaeskDLmTczm7obnFQoasrjyHH2Lxer6EfueFAoCaEzHqNcyo3CEZqDZJ2q

Next Steps with XForge:
1. Implement core trading infrastructure
   • Set up multi-wallet management
   • Configure DEX integration (Jupiter)
   • Establish real-time price feeds

2. Initial allocation strategy
   • Start with 70% AI tokens / 20% SOL / 10% stables
   • Select initial 10 AI tokens based on:
     - Volume > $10K daily
     - Active USDC pools
     - 3x liquidity coverage

3. Risk management setup
   • Position size limits
   • Slippage controls
   • Emergency exit protocols

Priority: Get basic infrastructure running this week so we can start initial allocations. Will share daily thoughts on strategy development and implementation progress.
